instructions.1: Place eggplant strips in a big pot of lightly salted water and soak for 30 minutes (this will improve the taste; they will leave a brown color in the pot).
instructions.2: Remove eggplant from pot and brush lightly with olive oil. Saute or grill until lightly browned and place in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Set aside.
instructions.3: Saute diced chicken and onion in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in tomato paste and water, cover skillet, reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
instructions.4: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
instructions.5: Pour chicken/tomato mixture over eggplant. Season with oregano, salt and pepper and cover with aluminum foil. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 5, is the oven from Step 4 being used?
Is oven from Step 4 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is onion from Step 3 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 5?
If we skip Step 4, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 5?
Can we place (Step 1) and saute (Step 3) at the same time?
